channel.title: Compiling problems... please help
channel.description:
Could someone please help me...
I am using Mod Thoraks 'perfect' compiler... Everytime i compile it says that i have 12 errors of which is fair enough as it is my first server... and it says it has been compiled successfully...
But when i run the server... all the changes i have done hasn't changed anything... for example: i changed the santa hat from being put in the hats slot to be put into the gloves slot... this means i could put my santa hat ontop of another hat... but once i compiled... and then tried it... it just didnt work, nothing else to it.
Could someone help please.

item.title: Compiling problems... please help
item.dc:creator: @bennyy bennyy
item.description:
@bennyy wrote:

Ok, i will post the errors… try and help if you can…

It says:

client.java:2006: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int anount) {
^

client.java:4460: illegal start of expression
public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1;
^

client.java:4461: illegal start of expression
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
^

client.java:8568: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetPlayerVars() {
^

client.java:8789: illegal start of expression
public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846,4846,4832,4817,48817};
^

client.java:8790: illegal start of expression
public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401,9571,3325,3086};
^

client.java:8797: illegal start of expression
public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) {
^

client.java:11536: illegal start of expression
public int Publicchat = 0;
^

client.java:11538: illegal start of expression
public void pmstatus(int status) {//status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2
^

client.java:15045: ‘;’ expected
}
^

client.java:15046: ‘}’ expected
^

12 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling problems... please help
item.dc:creator: @pker_franc0 pker franc0
item.description:
@pker_franc0 wrote:

you’ll have to fix the errors to let the changes happen u can remove that thing u added it might fix it and try to re-add it again? or u can post the error here and i might be able to help

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling problems... please help
item.dc:creator: @bennyy bennyy
item.description:
@bennyy wrote:

Could someone please help me…

I am using Mod Thoraks ‘perfect’ compiler…
Everytime i compile it says that i have 12 errors of which is fair enough as it is my first server… and it says it has been compiled successfully…

But when i run the server… all the changes i have done hasn’t changed anything…
for example: i changed the santa hat from being put in the hats slot to be put into the gloves slot…
this means i could put my santa hat ontop of another hat… but once i compiled… and then tried it…
it just didnt work, nothing else to it.

Could someone help please.

Read full topic
